faq.q1: Do AI-generated videos look like real people?
faq.a1: Yes, videos produced with the latest AI technology are of such quality that they are almost indistinguishable from real model shoots. You can see for yourself in our portfolio, and they are achieving high performance in actual advertising.
faq.q2: Are there any copyright or portrait rights issues?
faq.a2: Since they are AI-generated virtual people, there are no portrait rights issues. You can use them unlimitedly during the license period, and with a permanent license, you can use them forever. Zero risk of influencer scandals.
faq.a3: Each package includes a certain number of revisions, allowing for subtitle/text changes, color adjustments, length editing, etc. VIP PARTNER plan supports 5 revisions.
faq.a4: With a single payment, you can use the produced video forever. You can display it unlimitedly across all advertising channels (Meta, Google, TikTok, etc.) without any re-contracting or additional costs.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you support?
faq.a5: We support global payment gateway (Stripe) and local bank transfers. You can pay instantly with corporate/personal cards without complicated procedures. For large orders, our dedicated manager will assist with invoice issuance and payment processing.
